title: Scapu
description:
Whether you are a nomad, immigrant or simply just vacationing, feel at home and blend in using “Passport Hub” on Scapu. Scapu has a host of other features for you, from “Opinion Bar” to filter through mainstream media noise, to “Inner Circle” to help categorize your friends into distinct to discuss about common interests. For example, create a sports Inner Circle for all your friends who you love discussing sports with.

We are so excited to announce this product and SEE YOU ON SCAPU!
